Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • RegularPolygon
  • public class RegularPolygon
extends Shape
    This class is used to model regular n-sides polygon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Build a regular 3-sided polygon with a radius 1.0 This function would also set the vertices.
      RegularPolygon​(int n)
      Build a regular n-sided polygon with a radius 1.0.
      RegularPolygon​(int n, double r)
      Build a regular n-sided polygon with a radius of r.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean contains​(double x, double y)
      Determining if a point (x, y) in the canvas coordinate system is contained by the regular n-sided polygon.
      int getNumOfSides()
      Retrieve the number of sides of the regular polygon
      double getRadius()
      Retrieve the radius of the regular polygon
      void setNumOfSides​(int n)
      Set the number of sides of the polygon.
      void setRadius​(double r)
      Set the radius of the regular n-sided polygon.

      • Methods inherited from class Shape

        getColor, getFilled, getTheta, getX, getXc, getXLocal, getY, getYc, getYLocal, rotate, setColor, setFilled, setTheta, setXc, setXLocal, setYc, setYLocal, translate

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon​(int n,
                      double r)
        Build a regular n-sided polygon with a radius of r. If number of sides n is less than 3, the number of sides will be set to 3. If the radius r is less than 0, the radius will be set to 0. This function would also set the vertices.
        Parameters:
        n - number of sides
        r - radius of the polygon

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon​(int n)
        Build a regular n-sided polygon with a radius 1.0. If number of sides n is less than 3, the number of sides will be set to 3. This function would also set the vertices.
        Parameters:
        n - number of sides of polygon

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon()
        Build a regular 3-sided polygon with a radius 1.0 This function would also set the vertices.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumOfSides

        public int getNumOfSides()
        Retrieve the number of sides of the regular polygon
        Returns:
        the number of sides of polygon

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Retrieve the radius of the regular polygon
        Returns:
        the radius of the polygon

      • setNumOfSides

        public void setNumOfSides​(int n)
        Set the number of sides of the polygon. This method also reset the local coordinates of the vertices of the regular n-sided polygon. If the argument n is less than 3, the number of sides will be set to 3.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of sides of polygon

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius​(double r)
        Set the radius of the regular n-sided polygon. This method also reset the local coordinates of the vertices of the regular n-sided polygon. If the argument r is less than 0, the radius will be set to 0.
        Parameters:
        r - the radius of the polygon

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(double x,
                        double y)
        Determining if a point (x, y) in the canvas coordinate system is contained by the regular n-sided polygon.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the point in canvas coordinate system
        y - y-coordinate of the point in canvas coordinate system
        Returns:
        the boolean value specify whether the point is contained by the polygon
